Key_Insight: ServiceTitan dominates but 60% still use QuickBooks. Dispatch/scheduling pain is acute.
Rose Rocket targets fleets 20+. Small trucking uses spreadsheets + TMS hate. Compliance pain (ELD, IFTA) is forcing digitization.
Jobber, Housecall Pro, ServiceTitan compete but 50%+ still use pen & paper dispatch. High ghosting rate.
NetSuite too expensive. QuickBooks + spreadsheets is the norm. Inventory + order management pain is massive. Long sales cycles but sticky.
Same dynamics as HVAC/plumbing. Permitting + inspection tracking is a unique pain point.
ShipBob, Flexport dominate enterprise. Regional 3PLs use Fishbowl or worse. WMS is painful but necessary.
ConnectWise, Autotask, Datto PSA own the market. But 40% of small MSPs still use disparate tools. RMM + PSA + documentation gap.
AccuLynx, JobNimbus exist but adoption is weak. Estimating + photo documentation + insurance claims workflow is painful.
CCC ONE, Mitchell dominate with insurance integration lock-in. But shops hate them. Estimating software is mandatory evil.
WebPT, Clinicient, Prompt dominate. HIPAA + insurance billing creates huge switching costs. Hard to break in without clearinghouse partnerships.
Janitorial Manager, CleanTelligence exist but penetration is <20%. Workforce management + supply tracking pain. High churn business.
Applied Epic, Vertafore AMS360, Hawksoft own this. Agency management systems are deeply integrated with carriers. Almost impossible to displace.
Shop-Ware, Mitchell 1, Tekmetric compete heavily. 2-way text with customers + digital inspections is the new battleground.
Buildertrend, CoConstruct, Procore (overkill) compete. Project management + client communication + change orders is the pain.
Overlap with GCs. Houzz Pro exists but is weak on operations. Estimating + job costing + client communication.
AppFolio, Buildium, Rentec dominate. Tenant/landlord portals + maintenance coordination + accounting. Hard to displace due to tenant data lock-in.
Dentrix, Eaglesoft, Open Dental have 80%+ market share. HIPAA + insurance billing + imaging integration = fortress moat.
QuickBooks Online + practice management tools fragmented. Karbon, Canopy, Financial Cents compete. Client portal + workflow management pain.
Onfleet, Route4Me, Tookan compete. Route optimization + proof of delivery + customer notifications. Amazon/gig economy pressure.
Clio, MyCase, PracticePanther dominate. Trust accounting + case management + client intake. Very sticky once implemented.
PestPac, ServSuite, FieldRoutes compete. Recurring service model. Route optimization + chemical inventory tracking.
Bullhorn, Avionte dominate. ATS + back-office (payroll, billing, onboarding) integration. Compliance heavy. Long sales cycles.
Zenoti, Boulevard, Vagaro compete. Appointment booking + EMR + product inventory. Instagram-driven marketing is key differentiator.
Jobber, Housecall Pro work here but low adoption. Estimating paint quantity + project tracking. High business churn.
Agency management is fragmented: Monday.com, ClickUp, Productive.io, Function Point. Profitability tracking + client reporting pain.
LMN, Aspire, Yardbook compete. Route optimization + crew management. Seasonal business = churn risk.
Epic, athenahealth, Kareo own this. EMR + practice management + billing. Regulatory nightmare. Near-impossible to break in without partnerships.
Brokermint, SkySlope, Back At You compete. Transaction management + commission tracking. Dotloop/DocuSign partnerships matter.
Shop management software overlap with auto repair. Inventory management + appointment booking. Point-of-sale integration critical.
ADP, Paychex, Gusto dominate. Tax filing + compliance + benefits admin. Heavily regulated. Multi-year contracts are standard.
Housecall Pro, Jobber, ZenMaid compete. Scheduling + payments + customer communication. Brutal churn - both businesses and software.
Mindbody dominates, Pike13, Glofox compete. Class scheduling + payments + waitlists. Business model is fragile - 80% fail.
SimplePractice, TherapyNotes, TheraNest compete. EHR + scheduling + insurance billing. HIPAA compliance. Teletherapy surge.
Vagaro, Square Appointments, Booksy, Fresha compete. Appointment booking + payments + client retention. Owner-operator resistance.
Guesty, Hostaway, Lodgify compete. Multi-platform listing + pricing + cleaning coordination. Airbnb policy changes kill margins.
Procare, Brightwheel, HiMama compete. Parent communication + billing + licensing compliance. Regulation varies wildly by state.
CaterTrax, Caterease exist but weak adoption. Event management + proposal generation + kitchen production. Profitability is tough.
Square Appointments, Booksy, The Cut dominate low end. Cash businesses resist software. Loyalty programs don't work.
Mindbody, Pike13, Momence compete. Scheduling + memberships + livestream. Business churn mirrors fitness studio failure rates.
Vagaro, Square, Booksy compete at low end. Cash-heavy businesses. Language barriers often exist. Low digital adoption.
Shopify app ecosystem is insanely crowded. Klaviyo, Gorgias, Recharge dominate their categories. Customer lifetime value is terrible.
Overlap with salons/spas. Boulevard, Vagaro, Booksy compete. Booking + retail product inventory. Mostly solopreneurs.
Square, Lightspeed, Vend compete. POS + inventory + e-commerce. Amazon pressure. Declining brick-and-mortar viability.
Trainerize, My PT Hub, TrueCoach compete. Workout programming + client check-ins. High churn business AND software.
Toast, Square, Clover, Lightspeed own this. POS + online ordering + labor management. Razor-thin margins. Third-party delivery hell.
POS dominates (Clover, Square, NCR). Inventory + age verification + lottery. Competitive pressure from chains.
Toast, Square, Aloha, Upserve dominate. POS + reservations + labor scheduling. 60% fail in year 1. Profitability crisis post-COVID.
